sentences.cn: 一只蚊子, 一只讨厌的昆虫.

sentences.en: Blind guides, who strain out the gnat but swallow the camel!
sentences.cn: 24瞎眼领路的, 蠓虫你们就滤出来,骆驼你们倒吞下去.

sentences.en: He'll hardly reach his aim, because he strains at gnat.
sentences.cn: 他很难达到目的, 因为他这人太拘泥细节了.

sentences.en: He's always straining at a gnat.
I had tried a comic strip based on a bug Gnat.
sentences.cn: 作者先是想画一套以一只虫子——哥诺姆·哥奈特为主要人物的连环画.

sentences.en: She had the attention span of a gnat, but she was fantastic.
sentences.cn: 她的关注范围像昆虫一样小, 但她非常棒.

sentences.en: She'll consider it your fault if we quarrel because you strain at a gnat.
sentences.cn: 她会认为我们的争吵是你错了,因为你这么斤斤计较.

sentences.en: Strain at a gnat and swallow a camel.
There is a gnat bite on my hand.
sentences.cn: 我的手上有个小虫叮的包.

sentences.en: They, and we, and the smallest gnat in the grass are linked in the web of biodiversity - and the demise of one is a warning to all.
sentences.cn: 它们、我们、以及草丛中的小昆虫都联结在生物多样性这张网上，其中一种的消亡就是对全体的警告。

sentences.en: When you write for a blog, your audience consists of internet users who have the attention span of a gnat.
sentences.cn: 当你写博客时，你的读者是网络用户组成的，他们的注意力范围就像一个小昆虫。

sentences.en: Ye blind guides, which strain at a gnat, and swallow a camel.
sentences.cn: 24你们这瞎眼领路的, 蠓虫你们就滤出来, 骆驼你们倒吞下去.

sentences.en: You blind guides , who strain out a gnat and swallow a camel!
sentences.cn: 太23:24你们这瞎眼领路的、虫你们就滤出来、驼你们倒吞下去.

sentences.en: You blind guides ! You strain out a gnat but swallow a camel.
sentences.cn: 你们这瞎眼领路的、蠓虫你们就滤出来、骆驼你们倒吞下去.

sentences.en: You need not sing to me like a gnat to profound that question.
sentences.cn: 你用不着象蚊子那样哼哼唧唧地提出这个问题.

sentences.en: You strain out a gnat and swallow a camel ( Matthew 23:23 - 24 , TLB ) .
sentences.cn: 你们这瞎眼领路的, 蠓虫 你们就滤出来,骆驼你们倒吞下去.

trans.tran_en: A gnat is a very small flying insect that bites people and usually lives near water
